pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Simultaneous Confidence Bands Based on the Efficient Influence Function and Multiplier Bootstrap // Compute critical values for constructing uniform (simultaneous) confidence bands. The critical value is calculated using a multiplier bootstrap of the empirical efficient influence function as described by Kennedy (2019) doi:10.1080/01621459.2017.1422737. The multiplier bootstrap does not require resampling of the data but only simulation of the multipliers and is thus computationally efficient.
